corePackage.description: Centralized Reporting and Smart Integrations for Salesforce Quality.
releaseNotes: News: Provar Manager will be renamed to Provar Quality Hub in future releases. Stay tuned for more!
Test Case Generation: UI/UX updated for improved look and feel in selecting test cases, input fields, & previewing outputs.
Test Case Generation: Max number of test cases increased to 25 at once.
Test Case Generation: Enhanced prompts for Apex & Java code.
Test Case Generation: Increased token limit for scenario improvement & test case generation.
Issue-Aware Generation: Auto-populates linked Issue, recommended field set, default intent name, & scenario description.
Integrations: DevOps Testing now fully supported, with improved reporting & tighter integration.
Plugins: JIRA API endpoints were deprecated, & we have updated our plugin to match the new endpoints.
Plugins: Provar for Agentforce will be released soon on the AgentExchange & will include test schedule creation & execution assistance.
Reliability & Bug Fixes: Resolved 2 separate bugs related to loading Provar Grid videos.

Known Issue: There is still a known issue related to displaying Provar Grid videos in-app due to security updates from Salesforce. Let us know if you encounter any issues & we can provide a work-around!
Testing & SDLC: Improved overall test coverage & internal proceses for faster, more reliable release cycles.

plugins.description: Connect to your Jira org, import projects and issues into Provar Quality Hub, relate test cases to issues, and export defects as bugs back into Jira.
releaseNotes: Patch Fix for JIRA API changes
Added one-shot JIRA project import feature
Implemented Import job completion notifications
Started initial phase of bi-directional sync from Provar Quality Hub to JIRA
Delivered various bug fixes

plugins.description: Embed manual and automated testing into your release pipeline.
releaseNotes: DevOps engineers can leverage 2 new Quality Pipelines (i.e. flow templates) to automatically trigger the execution in Provar Grid of Provar test cases directly or indirectly related to a work item when its status changes to 'In Review'
Fixed package installation issue.

plugins.description: Embed manual and automated testing into your release pipeline.
releaseNotes: Closed-loop integration with DevOps Testing is now generally available!
Provar Quality Hub Test Plan Schedule Job results syncing now properly updates DevOps Testing Suites, Executions, Execution Groups, & Quality Gates.
Improved overall test coverage for DevOps Testing integration.
Renamed Provar Quality Hub to Provar Quality Hub in the Test Provider & project linking process.
Updated package dependencies to latest versions of all applications for compatibility.
Provar Quality Hub users can leverage Agentforce to trigger the execution of tests (using test plan schedules).

plugins.description: Link Test Plans and Gearset CI Jobs to enable automated CI/CD with test automation embedded. Trigger and manage Gearset jobs from Provar Quality Hub to streamline releases, increase test coverage, and improve delivery quality without leaving Salesforce.
releaseNotes: Trigger, Cancel, and Monitor Gearset Jobs from Provar Quality Hub.
Link Gearset CI Jobs to Provar Test Plan Schedules for a fully automated DevOps Pipeline.
Gearset Job syncing for keeping Gearset CI Job history and Provar Quality Hub job histories in sync.
Enhanced security for all SOQL/DML actions has been added.

plugins.description: Relate test cases to branches and see their execution status per environment from within the branch itself.
releaseNotes: Relate test cases to branches using Branch Test Case records.
Map PM system records to Flosum org records to show test executions on branch records.
Fixed vulnerabilities from code scan tools.

plugins.description: Relate test cases to user stories and see their execution status per environment from within the user story itself.
releaseNotes: Include flow templates to run test cases (via Apex or Provar Grid) related to user stories or their tracked metadata, when their status changes to 'Ready for testing'.

plugins.description: Connect to QualityClouds and retrieve code scans so they can be analysed in Provar Quality Hub.
releaseNotes: Fix callout to QualityClouds API to retrieve code scans.

plugins.description: Connect to Clayton and retrieve code scans so they can be analysed in Provar Quality Hub.
releaseNotes: Fix bug with handling of branch names.

plugins.description: Connect to your Azure DevOps org, import projects and work items into Provar Quality Hub, relate test cases to work items, and export defects as bugs back into Azure DevOps.
releaseNotes: Connect Provar Quality Hub to Azure DevOps.
Import projects with their work item types and work item relation types.
Import work items of any type.
Send bugs to Azure DevOps from the defect record and have it automatically linked to the related work item.
Bug Fixes and Improved Stability

plugins.description: Provar Automation is an end-to-end test automation solution built for Salesforce.
releaseNotes: Winter 26 Compatibility
CPQ v258 Winter 26 compatibility
Edge Chromium as Authoring Browser
Edge Options support for automation execution
Edge Driver auto-detect & auto-download (with manual override)
Chrome 137 extension policy update (one-time install from Web Store)
System environment variable support for connections
Security improvements with Eclipse & dependency upgrades (CVE fixes)

plugins.description: ProvarDX provides the capability to extend your Salesforce CLI to run Provar test cases and simplifies scratch Org testing.
releaseNotes: Provar Quality Hub commands added to connect, display, open to Provar Quality Hub Orgs.
Provar Quality Hub commands added to retrieve, run, and report on test cases in Provar Quality Hub.
Provar Quality Hub commands added to upload code coverage and code quality reports directly to Provar Quality Hub.

plugins.description: This Jenkins plugin lets you set up and configure an environment to run Provar Automation tests with limited manual effort.
releaseNotes: Removed JDK 8 from build path in Jenkinsfile
Updated Jenkins BOM and Jenkins minimum version
